jsonData.question: 人老了倒也不怕热
answers: Old people are not afraid of heat.
My aging body is not as sensitive to the heat.
People are not afraid of heat when they are old.

jsonData.question: 我们能白首到老
answers: We will end up old and gray together.
We can grow old in vain.

jsonData.question: 一片冰心在玉壶
answers: A piece of ice heart in the jade pot.
This heirloom jade teapot is a symbol of pure love.
As impeccable as ice is my heart in a jade flask.

jsonData.question: 我保证会一生一世对你好
answers: I promise to be good to you forever.
I promise to take care of you for the rest of my life.
I promise to love and cherish you all my life.

jsonData.question: 一件衣裳罢了不值得生气
answers: A dress is not enough to make you be angry.
A piece of clothing is nothing to be angry with.
It’s not worthwhile being angry over a dress.
